description: Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate student Must be enrolled full-time Preference given for a student who plans on entering the Energy, Oil, & Gas field Must be a Senior who will graduate the next semester Preference given to students from Accounting, Economics- Energy, Human Resources/Management and ISOM departments
